name: Demographic data
description: The Google Analytics collects demographic data such as the gender or the age of the users with their respective proportions. The data allows you to get a representation of your online customers to better serve their need.

blocks.description: It checks if demographic data are measured. If not, it shows a warning.
blocks.failHowtofix: Check, that demographic data measurement option is enabled in settings on property level. In other words, field Enable Demographics and Interests Reports should be turned on.
